types.html:
d'avec

  1. from
    se séparer l'un d'avec l'autre ― to separate from each other
    Ils déclarèrent la sécession d'avec le royaume.
    They declared secession from the kingdom.

Usage notes

[edit]

The terms indicates a separation or difference between two entities. It can be replaced by de when there would be no ambiguity with the other meanings of de.

title: d'avec
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /d‿a.vɛk/
